pages.text: The Soul of Supersonic provides 1.75x walking and running speed, and 2.5x flying speed.  The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_ultimate)Ultimate Talisman Base$(/l).  The soul is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:soul_of_dimensions)Soul of Dimensions$(/l).
The items to craft this are looted from mobs in the Fargo's Dungeon
